attributes.action: David Cameron to resign immediately when he loses the EU vote.
attributes.additional_details: Cameron has shown that he is untrustworthy. He still blames the previous Government for things that have still not worked out during his governing period.
attributes.background:
If Cameron losses the vote, I would not trust him to carry on and make the decisions we the public would want as Non EU members.
Cameron would still be trying to govern as if we were still in.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister or any other Minister is not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.
